The app froze my phone and made a screeching sound. I thought it was cursed but any counter curse I tried did nothing. My cat heard the noise and her eyes turned from green to red and she started attacking me and clawing MAGA and ALM into my skin and the floor. Unfortunately I had to wrestle her to the ground and delete the app as fast as I could. Immediately after I did, she turned back to normal and it seemed like she didnâ€™t even know what happened. 0/10 this app will brainwash you. I was only protected because of my connection with the spirits.
